DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate additive value tadalafil give together Diamox ( acetazolamide ) prevent acute mountain sickness traveler high altitude area .
DOC.brief_title: Tadalafil Acetazolamide Versus Acetazolamide Acute Mountain Sickness Prevention
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize control study comparing : Tadalafil [ 20mg x1/day ] acetazolamide [ 125mg x2 day ] , versus Acetazolamide [ 125mg x2 day ] alone , trekker altitude > 3,000 .
DOC.criteria: Participant trek high altitude Agreement sign inform consent . No agreement sign inform consent .
DOC.keyword: Acute Mountain Sickness assess Lake Louise score
